Package com.attivio.sdk.error

Class SchemaError

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.attivio.sdk.error.ErrorCode
      • com.attivio.sdk.error.SchemaError
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public final class SchemaError
extends ErrorCode
    Contains the error codes related to the applying the schema to a query or document.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
